TOOLTIP_BUTTON_PROMOTE_EMPLOYEE: Promote this employee (increases salary and happiness)
TOOLTIP_BUTTON_DISCIPLINE_EMPLOYEE: Demote this employee (decreases salary and happiness)
TOOLTIP_BUTTON_CLOSE_WINDOW: Close the window and cancel any pending actions
TOOLTIP_BUTTON_OPEN_MAIL: Open the selected mail for viewing
TOOLTIP_BUTTON_ARCHIVE_MAIL: Move the selected mail to the archive folder
TOOLTIP_BUTTON_ACCEPT_RESUME: Accept this candidate's resume (adds a new employee to your staff)
TOOLTIP_BUTTON_SELL_EQUIPMENT: Sell this equipment for half the purchase price
